title: How much is a 1 +2 seat setup worth?

posts.content:
I need to sell my front seast. They're from arhd bus and are a drivers seat and a +2 passenger seat.

They're both trimmed in a very retro material but are mint. I'd like to put them up for a fair price. Not doing myself out of money, but not trying to turn anyone over either.
Someone on here was very reasonable when buying an item off me today and it has made me remember what I like about this hobby. The fraternity.

Please provide me with your thoughts on a fair price for the pair and I'll put them up at that price in the for sale section.
